fields.headline: Alison Cork's finishing touches
fields.bodyText: Snap up a screwdriver To mark the launch of the Bosch IXO2, Bosch is giving away three of the new hi-tech screwdrivers, worth £34.99, to Cash readers. Perfect for domestic use, the Bosch IXO2 is a highly practical and easy-to-use tool, a must for every toolbox. To enter the free draw, simply send your name, address and a contact number on a postcard to: Bosch IXO2, Paskett PR, 50/51 Friar Gate, Derby DE1 1DF. Three names will be drawn on 10 September and the winners notified. Please note, there are no cash alternatives. For more information call 01895 838743 or visit the website www.boschpowertools.co.uk. Water works! We all know we shouldn't waste water, but did you know that with a few domestic amendments, you could cut water usage by up to 50 per cent? For example, by installing a low-flush WC, using water-efficient taps, planting drought-resistant plants in the garden, collecting rainwater - all quite manageable changes to your routine. The Green Building Store supplies a range of water-efficient products and has experts on hand to help you help yourself and the environment. Visit the website www.greenbuildingstore.co.uk or call 01484 854898. Terry's all gold Established for more than 30 years, Terry's Fabrics aims to provide the highest quality furnishing fabrics at the most competitive price, and, www.terrysfabrics.co.uk now showcases fabrics, curtain poles, blinds, a range of tiebacks, curtain-making accessories and a range of cushions starting at just £5! Trees by post Mail order is great for busy people and these days you can order just about anything through the post, including plants. Yorkshire Plants and Trees has a great range of topiary, specimen and exotic trees, perfect for clipped city gardens and country acres alike, and at excellent prices. Wonderful topiary spirals (£57 for a metre high, £87 for 1.5m), a weeping mulberry for £47 and a 3m magnolia for £450. The website is www.plantsandtrees.co.uk, or you can call 01423 331964 for more advice. Bargain of the week You're Furnished sells brand-name furniture, kitchens and bathrooms at up to 70 per cent less than the recommended retail price, simply because they are cancelled orders, returns and end-of-lines that the manufacturers no longer want. Better yet, You're Furnished currently has a consignment of designer sinks at a very special price for Cash readers. Available in three designs, white ceramic, black smoked glass and green glass. They normally sell for £249, but are available on a first-come, first-served basis for £129. There are just 270 in stock, so whatever you do, don't hang around. You're Furnished, Unit 4, Cambridge Road, Stansted, Essex CM24 8BZ. Call 01279 870036. · Alison Cork is a writer and broadcaster specialising in property. She also runs a website of recommended tradespeople in the London and M25 area (www.londontradesmen.co.uk) or you can phone 09066 171717 (calls cost 60p per minute 9am - 4pm Mon to Fri). If you can recommend a great tradesperson, homeware product or service, please email her at alison@alisoncork.com
